headline.print_headline: Psychologists Dispute Report on Their Role in Interrogations
headline.main: Critic of Psychologists’ Role in Interrogation Is Asked to Reconsider

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: David Hoffman, a Chicago lawyer, found that a number of psychologists had shielded America’s interrogation techniques.
lead_paragraph: David Hoffman, a Chicago lawyer, found that a number of psychologists had shielded America’s interrogation techniques.
